name: 3 Cups- Bartender Simulator
description:
I drew the 5 of wands (reversed) and the 3 of cups.

The 5 of wands normally indicates conflict, so reversed it would be focused on avoiding conflict. So, I decided to make something where you're trying to prevent a customer from getting angry, hence the time management aspect. The 3 of cups I used as a more literal inspiration to be the three ingredients the player combines to make the patron's drink of choice. (A Manhattan with vermouth, rye whiskey, and bitters).

I spent the majority of time on this one practicing my sprite-making and pixel art, so the game itself is pretty buggy.
